define: Use this api to bind first mile tracking number for courier delivery method.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The shipment method for generate and bind orders. Available value: courier_delivery.

","name":"shipment_method","sample":"courier_delivery","type":"string","required":"True","key":"EKmNwDP"},{"description":"

If using courier_delivery as the shipment method, the \"binding_id\" field should pass the value generated from v2.first_mile.generate_and_bind_first_mile_tracking_number.
